committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide military retired pay to certain persons who were members of the United States merchant marine during World War II.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to military retired pay to entitle certain persons who were members of the U.S. merchant marine during World War II to such pay. Directs the Secretary of Transportation, within 60 days after the enactment of this Act, to make lump-sum payments of such accrued pay to such persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide military retired pay to certain persons who were members of the United States merchant marine during World War II.
